name: UP920974 - Gravi-d0dge
description:
The game says it, dodge enemies by flipping gravity. The more you score, the tougher the game becomes. More info on how to play the game before the start of the game :)

**IMP NOTE**

This game only works on a 16:9 aspect ratio with res of 1280X720 or more, or else the game is going to be cropped. Sorry for the inconvenience :(

Also none of the sounds used in this game is copyrighted. Big shout out to my m8 jet podunkar (not form the course btw) for assisting me in making the audio for this game
